text: E'ina hu'negu nenfugatane nasareheheta na'a efore hugahie? Eme atru hanaza zupa, mago'mo mono zagamera nehinkeno, mago'mo rempi huneraminkeno, mago'mo kasefa zama Anumzamo'ma averi haniaza huama nehinkeno, mago'mo ru ageru'ma nerinkeno, mago'mo rekrehe hugahie. Hagi e'i ana maka'zama hanaza zamo'a, knare huno mono kevua zamaza huno, Ramofompina zamazeri hankavetigahie.
